title: Fortune's Forbidden Woman
description: Creed Fortune had hungered for Maya Blackstone for nearly a decade, but he'd held back to protect his family's reputation.After all, the press would have a field day if they uncovered a clandestine affair between a Fortune heir and his very own stepsister! Then a heated argument between Creed and Maya turned into a feverish night of lovemaking. Even though the raven-haired schoolteacher melted his heart in ways he'd never dreamed possible, Creed had to find a way to douse their dangerous attraction. Otherwise, the sordid truth could topple the Fortune empire!
author: Heidi Betts
